Text: AWESOME!!!  Thanks, I lost my copy of this years ago...Great album by a great band.
Excuse me, with all due respect......you can't seperate "The Hellion" from "Electric Eye". You can't, you can't, YOU FUCKING CAN'T !!!!!! It takes quite an effort to join these two parts.

^ They're separated like that on the real album, which i just realized i own so idk why i redownloaded this after my file got deleted. Well whatever, great quality, properly tagged with artwork. Good upload thanks.
